dcterms:creator: Pranav Narayanan Venkit
Shomir Wilson
dcterms:description: A corpus created to identify bias against people with disabilities in sentiment analysis and toxicity detection models, utilizing statistical exploration of conversations on social media platforms.
dcterms:title: Bias Identification Test in Sentiment (BITS) corpus

dcterms:creator: Pranav Narayanan Venkit
Mukund Srinath
Shomir Wilson
dcterms:description: A study that investigates implicit bias in pretrained language models against people with disabilities, analyzing various models to reveal significant biases.
dcterms:title: Sentiment analysis and toxicity detection models

dcterms:creator: Pranav Narayanan Venkit
Sanjana Gautam
Ruchi Panchanadikar
Ting-Hao Huang
Shomir Wilson
dcterms:description: A dataset examining nationality bias in text generation, focusing on how language models represent different nationalities and the societal stereotypes that arise from these representations.
dcterms:title: Nationality Bias in Text Generation

dcterms:creator: Pranav Narayanan Venkit
Sanjana Gautam
Ruchi Panchanadikar
Ting-Hao Huang
Shomir Wilson
dcterms:description: A study that investigates human perception of nationalities in AI-generated articles, exploring how biases in AI can affect public perception.
dcterms:title: Human perception of nationalities in AI-generated articles
